#print Units.isUnit_units_mul /-
/-- Multiplication by a `u : Mˣ` on the left doesn't affect `is_unit`. -/
@[simp, to_additive "Addition of a `u : add_units M` on the left doesn't affect `is_add_unit`."]
theorem Units.isUnit_units_mul {M : Type _} [monoid M] (u : «expr ˣ» M) (a : M) : is_unit (↑u * a) ↔ is_unit a :=
  iff.intro
    (fun ⟨v, hv⟩ => by
      have : is_unit (↑u⁻¹ * (↑u * a)) := by exists u⁻¹ * v <;> rw [← hv, Units.val_mul]
      rwa [← mul_assoc, Units.inv_mul, one_mul] at this)
    u.is_unit.mul
#align units.is_unit_units_mul Units.isUnit_units_mul
-/

theorem divp_mul_cancel (a : α) (u : «expr ˣ» α) : «expr /ₚ » a u * u = a :=

theorem divp_eq_iff_mul_eq {x : α} {u : «expr ˣ» α} {y : α} : «expr /ₚ » x u = y ↔ y * u = x :=

@[field_simps]
theorem divp_eq_divp_iff {x y : α} {ux uy : «expr ˣ» α} : «expr /ₚ » x ux = «expr /ₚ » y uy ↔ x * uy = y * ux := by

/-- `field_simp` needs the reverse direction of `divp_assoc` to move all `/ₚ` to the right. -/
@[field_simps]
theorem divp_assoc' (x y : α) (u : «expr ˣ» α) : x * «expr /ₚ » y u = «expr /ₚ » (x * y) u :=

#print divp_assoc /-
theorem divp_assoc (a b : α) (u : «expr ˣ» α) : «expr /ₚ » (a * b) u = a * «expr /ₚ » b u :=

theorem coe_one : ((1 : «expr ˣ» α) : α) = 1 :=

theorem coe_mul : (↑(a * b) : α) = a * b :=

theorem coe_mk (a : α) (b h₁ h₂) : ↑(units.mk a b h₁ h₂) = a :=

theorem coe_inv_mul (h : is_unit a) : ↑h.unit⁻¹ * a = 1 :=

theorem coe_inv {M : Type _} [division_monoid M] (u : Units M) : ↑u⁻¹ = (u⁻¹ : M) :=

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ˣ» -/

theorem coe_eq_one {a : «expr ˣ» α} : (a : α) = 1 ↔ a = 1 := by rw [← Units.val_one, eq_iff]
#align coe_eq_one coe_eq_one
